bottomFixStyle = style([(position, kstring("fixed")), (bottom,
    kstring("calc(16px + env(safe-area-inset-bottom))")),
                        (left, kstring("50%")),
                        (transform, kstring("translateX(-50%)")),
                        (zIndex, kstring("100"))])
